Cross-Sector Measures

Vision: These measures relate to all other sectors included in the dashboard. Cross-sector measures, such as financial wellbeing, give insight into the foundations of communities' lives.

Definitions

Personal wellbeing index
The personal wellbeing index is calculated by DataHaven on a scale of 0 to 100, based on residents' self-reported happiness, health, anxiety, depression, life satisfaction, and time to enjoy their lives.
Target indicators
Total population, 1980-2015
Source: US Census Bureau
Personal wellbeing index, 2015
Source: 2015 DataHaven Community Wellbeing Survey
Financial wellbeing, 2015
Source: 2015 DataHaven Community Wellbeing Survey
Poverty rate by age and race, 2015
Source: US Census Bureau, American Community Survey

Key

  • CT: Connecticut
  • GNH: Greater New Haven region
  • NHV low-income: Low-income neighborhoods in New Haven
  • Other NHV: Non-low-income neighborhoods in New Haven
